options.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config apps/bundle-size/webpack.config.js --mode production

development.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config apps/bundle-size/webpack.config.js --mode development

production.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config apps/bundle-size/webpack.config.js --mode production

options.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config apps/bundle-size/webpack.config.js --mode production --port 3005 --no-hot

development.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config apps/bundle-size/webpack.config.js --mode development --port 3005

production.command: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config apps/bundle-size/webpack.config.js --mode production --port 3005 --no-hot

options.command: pnpm exec cypress run --config-file apps/bundle-size/cypress.config.ts --e2e --config baseUrl=http://127.0.0.1:3005 --browser chrome

development.command: pnpm exec cypress open --config-file apps/bundle-size/cypress.config.ts --e2e --config baseUrl=http://127.0.0.1:3005 --browser electron

commands.command: npx nx build bundle-size --configuration=production && sleep 1 && if [ -f apps/bundle-size/dist/remoteEntry.js ]; then ls -lah apps/bundle-size/dist/remoteEntry.js | awk '{print "remoteEntry.js size: " $5}' && gzip -c apps/bundle-size/dist/remoteEntry.js | wc -c | awk '{print "gzip size: " $1 " bytes"}' && brotli -c apps/bundle-size/dist/remoteEntry.js | wc -c | awk '{print "brotli size: " $1 " bytes"}'; else echo "remoteEntry.js not found"; fi
